Dashboard.Name: Sales Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard visualizes data that provides a quick and easy way to monitor and analyze sales performance. It displays the key performance indicators (KPIs): total sales, total orders, total products, sales by channel, top 5 countries by sales, top 5 products sold, total orders by shipping mode, top 5 companies by sales, and product details. These metrics help sales teams and management to track progress toward sales goals, identify areas for improvement, and make informed decisions based on data.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Spline Chart, Column Chart, Bar Chart, Doughnut Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Patient Experience Analysis
Dashboard.Description: This Patient Experience Analysis Dashboard offers valuable insights into the quality of care and service provided by healthcare facilities. It includes key metrics such as the overall patient satisfaction, average visit length by department, average waiting time by department, patient feedback by gender, patients by department, and patient feedback details.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Date Picker, Column Chart, Combined Widget, Pie Chart, Grid, Radial Gauge, Doughnut Chart, HeatMap

Dashboard.Name: Hospital Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Hospital Management Dashboard displays healthcare metrics and KPIs, including data on doctors, admitted and readmitted patients, readmission rate, average length of stay, bed occupancy rate, patients by specialization, average cost of treatment by age group, patients by week, and upcoming appointments. The dashboard provides a comprehensive overview for informed decision-making and improving patient outcomes
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Date Picker, Stacked Chart, Pie Chart, TreeMap,Grid, Card, Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Supply Chain Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This supply chain performance dashboard helps to effectively track supply chain KPIs related to the efficiency of sales orders processing such as cash to cash cycle time, perfect order date, order status, feedback details, order details, on-time delivery rate, DSO , DIO, DPO, and so on. As the dashboard example says, these KPIs helps the manager to validate their business portfolio and plan for the long-time improvements as well.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Combo Box, Card, Grid, Spline Chart, Gauge, Stacked Column Chart, Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Supply Chain Inventory Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Supply Chain Inventory Management dashboard displays metrics related to inventory, helping organizations make informed decisions about inventory management. The dashboard displays these metrics: warehouse information, days of supply, stockout rate, return rate, backorder rate, inventory carrying cost, inventory turnover ratio, inventory-to-sales ratio, percentage of on-time shipments, and product stock information. Overall, this dashboard assists organizations in optimizing supply chains and maximizing inventory levels.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Combo Box, Card, Grid, Line Chart, Gauge, Stacked Column Chart, Doughnut Chart

Dashboard.Name: Customer Support Analysis (Random data)
Dashboard.Description: Analyze the efficiency of customer support.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Combo Box, Card, Grid, Line Chart, Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Real Estate Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Real Estate Management Dashboard helps real estate companies monitor their sales on a monthly basis with important metrics such as properties for sale, properties for rent, revenue trends, sales versus target, avg. visits per sale, avg. days on market, sales by region, property inquiry referrals, year-over-year variance of average sold price, actual calls and meetings made and recent Inquiry details.
Dashboard.Tags: Combine Widget, Number Card, Full Circle Gauge, Grid, Line Chart, Column Chart, Bar Chart, Choropleth Map, Spline Area Chart, Area Chart, Stacked Area Chart

Dashboard.Name: London Olympics 2012 medals analysis
Dashboard.Description: Analyze the final medals tally for the 2012 London Olympics.
Dashboard.Tags: Label, Combo Box, Column Chart, Choropleth Map, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Personal Expense Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This personal expense analysis dashboard offers a comprehensive view of a person's financial status. It includes key metrics like total income, expenses, and debts, providing a holistic understanding of a person's finances. Projected expenses and predicted income enable them to plan for the future, while cashflow forecasting ensures they have visibility into their financial inflows and outflows. Analyze income by category and identify the top 5 expense categories, gaining insights into spending patterns. The saving rate and expense-to-income ratio offer valuable indicators of financial health. Budget compliance by category helps one stay on track with spending goals, while expense breakdown by category provides a detailed breakdown of expenses. Additionally, the transaction details give a comprehensive overview of all this person's financial activities.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Doughnut Chart, Pie Chart, Radial Gauge, Bar Chart, Spline Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Northwind Products and Suppliers Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Analyze the sales performance of different products Information: This dashboard shows the popularity of different products sold in a fictitious company.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Column Chart, Choropleth Map, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Website Visitor Analysis
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard provides an analysis of user behavior for a fictitious e-commerce website.The dashboard also shows a forecast for visitor and purchaser patterns for the year 2019.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Date Picker, Card, Line Chart, Pie Chart, Grid, Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Customer Support Representative Performance Analysis (Random data)
Dashboard.Description: Analyze the performance of a support representative.
Dashboard.FileName: Customer Support representative performance analysis (Random data).sydj
Dashboard.Tags: Grid, Pie Chart, Card, Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Sales Performance
Dashboard.Description: Overview of total production and sales through online and retail channels, product expiration details, and percentage of products returned by customers.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Gauge, Column Chart, Pie Chart, Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Production Monitoring Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Production Monitoring Dashboard shows the key metrics of a manufacturing company so it can improve the effectiveness of its processes: cycle time, yield, throughput, workforce productivity, lead time, quantity produced, rework quantity, cost analysis over time, top 5 machines by production volume, availability, performance, quality, overall efficiency effectiveness (OEE), production variance, production efficiency: runtime vs. downtime, average hours to product completion by product and operator, downtime causes, and defect analysis by type and rate.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Area Chart, Stacked Bar Chart, Radial Gauge, Combo Chart, Doughnut Chart, Stacked Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Retail Sales Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard showcases the retail sales analysis with respect to the product category. It also shows the continent wise sales and quarter wise sales.
Dashboard.Tags: Label, Date Picker, Combo Box, Column Chart, Tree Map, Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Patient Health Summary Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Patient Health Summary dashboard helps health care professionals monitor a patient’s health information including the metrics for their heart rate, blood pressure, respiration rate, blood cholesterol, blood glucose, body temperature, BMI, and more.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Image, Grid, Card, Stacked Area chart

Dashboard.Name: Telecom Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This telecom management dashboard is a critical tool for monitoring and managing the performance of a telecommunications company. It provides a comprehensive view of the business's performance by tracking various key performance indicators such as service type, revenue, total subscribers, new subscribers, disconnects, gross vs net subscriber additions, expenses, subscriber acquisition cost, subscriber retention rate, churn rate, average revenue per user, percentage of data plans, services utilization, network utilization by subscribers, and capex to sales ratio.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Map, Pie Chart, 100% Stacked Area Chart, Card, Column Chart, Combo Chart, Radial Gauge, Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: Property Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This property management dashboard showcases the total property including net promoter score, occupancy rate, properties won versus properties lost, net income, expiring lease, occupied and vacant count, rent on-time paid versus rent arrears, loss due to vacancy, and operating expense.
Dashboard.Tags: Doughnut Chart, Stacked Column Chart, Column Chart, Radial Gauge, Area Chart, List Box, Line Chart, Spline Chart, Spline Area Chart

Dashboard.Name: FIFA World Cup 2014 - Brazil
Dashboard.Description: Visualize the FIFA World Cup tournament statistics.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Grid, Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Worldwide Car Sales Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard visualizes the car sales throughout the world wide.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Combo Box, Card, Choropleth Map, Doughnut Chart, Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Production Line Status Score Card
Dashboard.Description: Today's status of Availability, Performance, Quality and Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE) in each line of manufacturing.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Tickets Sales Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of ticket sales performance for events. Key metrics such as revenue, tickets sold, and average ticket price are readily available, while revenue by ticket type and top 5 shows by ticket sales offer insights into which types of tickets and events are driving the most revenue. In addition, you can monitor ticket sales by source and type to optimize marketing strategies, and view demographic breakdowns to understand your audience better. Metrics like time to sell out, sell-through rate, upsell rate, and conversion rate help you evaluate the effectiveness of your sales and marketing efforts, while attendance rate and refund rate provide insight into customer satisfaction. Detailed show and ticket information and issued vs. sold ticket breakdowns, sales by region and customer feedback complete the picture, giving you a full understanding of your event's performance.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Combo Box, Card, Bar Chart, Column Chart, Pie Chart, Spline Chart, Doughnut Chart, Stacked Bar Chart, Radial Gauge, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Telecom Customer Satisfaction Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Telecom Customer Satisfaction Dashboard provides a comprehensive view of all key support-related metrics for a telecom company. The dashboard displays important subscriber information such as names, contact information, and service plans. Furthermore, the dashboard monitors key performance indicators such as customer satisfaction (CSAT), net promoter score (NPS), customer lifetime value (LTV), repurchasing rate, and average first contact resolution rate (FCR). This data enables telecom companies to easily monitor and assess their customer support performance, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions to improve their overall customer experience.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Doughnut Chart, Combo Chart, Column Chart, Spline Area_Chart,Grid, Card, Gauge

Dashboard.Name: Online Food Ordering Analysis
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard provides insights into the revenue and order details of an online food-ordering portal.The dashboard also visualizes the revenue forecast for the year 2019.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Column Chart, Line Chart, Spline Chart, Doughnut Chart

Dashboard.Name: Policy Claim Detailed Analysis
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard is an overview of policy claim details, claim amounts, and average cost comparison, along with customer feedback.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Label, Column Chart, Spline Chart, Bar Chart, Stacked Column Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Network Management
Dashboard.Description: The Network Management dashboard showcases the essential key metrics of a telecom service company such as dropped services, jitter, delay, call setup time, bit rate, packet loss, round-trip time, and throughput time.
Dashboard.Tags: Spline Chart, Card, Combo box, Tree Map

Dashboard.Name: 2016 Summer Olympics Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Visualize the overall medal tally and the medals won by country.
Dashboard.Tags: Label, Card, Choropleth Map, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Financial Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Overview of revenue and expense details, online vs. retail sales comparison, regional revenue, and predicted revenue for the next three months.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Card, Gauge, Combo Box, Pie Chart, Column Chart, Choropleth Map

Dashboard.Name: School Improvement Grants Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard provides insights into how the improvements were planned in the various models selected with a comprehensive view of the School Improvement Grants program (SIG), which helps identify areas where improvements can be made with these metrics: total granted amount, total requested amount, granted/requested percentage, improvement grants by state and intervention model, grant applications, schools benefited, grant application progress by stage, schools implementing each model, risk assessment of grant requests, and grant variance and disbursement summary.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Map, Pie Chart, Doughnut Chart, Bar Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Motor Vehicle Accident Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Motor Vehicle Accident Analysis Dashboard shows accidents based on contributing factors, such as human error, environment, and vehicle flaw with these metrics: total accidents, total fatalities, distracted driving fatalities, accidents and fatalities by state, accidents by vehicle type, most accident prone drivers, accident trends by month, top 10 states with the most accidents, casualties by mode of transport, vehicle casualties, casualty severity, accidents by day of the week, top 10 accident types, casualties by vehicle body type, and casualties by month.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Choropleth Map, Pie Chart, Column Chart, Spline Chart, TreeMap, Combined Widget, Doughnut Chart, Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Financial Management
Dashboard.Description: This financial management dashboard displays key metrics for a company's finances and performance over a specific period. The dashboard includes metrics such as accounts receivable, accounts payable, days sales in inventory, days sales outstanding, days payable outstanding, current ratio, gross profit margin, revenue, debt-to-equity ratio, burn rate, equity ratio, and receivable and payable accounts by payment target. Additionally, the dashboard provides insights on net and gross working capital, as well as a profit and loss summary.
Dashboard.Tags: Combined Widget, Image Widget, Card, Radial Gauge, Combo Chart, Spline Chart, Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Online Marketing Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard contains various key metrics for an analysis of online marketing details: customer acquisition cost, visitor count, return on investment, and customer visits based on channels or sources.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Doughnut Chart, Spline Chart, Line Chart, Area Chart

Dashboard.Name: Support Tickets Management
Dashboard.Description: Detailed information on the support tickets created and resolved.
Dashboard.Tags: DatePicker, Card, Doughnut Chart, Stacked Column Chart, Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: Insurance Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This insurance performance dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of key metrics related to an insurance company's performance. It includes the metrics: policies sold, assured amount, average premium, premium, average claim processing time, customer retention rate, policy renewal rate, net promoter score, insurance performance ratios, annual premium equivalent performance by channel, profit vs. expenses by policy type, annual premium equivalent performance by region, assured amount by policy type, APE performance by year and policy type, policy holder age distribution, and loss severity. With these metrics, the dashboard offers a view of the company's sales, financials, customer satisfaction, operational efficiency, and policyholder demographics. It enables stakeholders to track performance trends, identify areas for improvement, and make data-driven decisions to optimize business operations and enhance customer experiences.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Doughnut Chart, Column Chart, Heat Map, Map, Radial Gauge, Pie Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Project Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard provides an overview of the projects undertaken by an IT company. The dashboard displays all essential key metrics such as customer satisfaction, deadline, investment and profit details.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Radial Gauge, Radar Polar, Stacked Column Chart, Pie Chart

Dashboard.Name: Energy Production and Consumption Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard analyzes energy production and consumption levels in each state in the USA. The metrics covered are energy efficiency, energy consumption by state, top 10 states in energy production and consumption, energy production by source, total production, total consumption, production cost, and energy consumption by sector.
Dashboard.Tags: Map Chart,Card, Radial Gauge, Pie Cahrt, Column Chart, Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Power Plant Monitoring Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This monitoring dashboard shows the production metrics of a power plant including total capacity, and various other parameters such as ambient temperature, relative humidity, system frequency, return on investment, turbine efficiency, turbine status and also power plant details.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Radial Gauge,Bar Chart, Column Chart, Pie Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: School Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: School Performance Dashboard visualizes key metrics and KPIs such as student and faculty retention, syllabus coverage, admission rate, fee collection, graduation rate, and student and parent satisfaction levels. This dashboard is intended to assist school administrators in monitoring and analyzing the overall performance of the school and identifying areas for improvement. The dashboard is simple to use and provides a snapshot of the school's performance, with clear charts and graphs that assist stakeholders in making data-driven decisions to optimize school operations and improve the educational experience for students and faculty.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, KPI,Stacked_Bar_Chart, Spline Chart, Doughnut Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Student Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The student performance dashboard presents crucial metrics and key performance indicators, including the average subject score, participation rate, and examination results. These metrics aid in evaluating student performance and identifying areas for improvement. The dashboard presents a clear and concise summary of student performance, enabling educators to make informed decisions and enhance overall academic outcomes.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Column Chart, Doughnut Chart,Radial Gauge, Bar Chart,Grid

Dashboard.Name: Higher Education Enrollment and Retention Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Higher Education enrollment and retention dashboard visualizes the important KPIs related to the enrollment of students of your college/university based on their ethnicity, courses, gender and age. You can monitor the metrics that include students attendance, Course completion rate, Freshman retention rate, Teacher to student ratio and more.
Dashboard.Tags: List Box, Card, Column Chart, Doughnut Chart, Pie Chart, Bar Chart, Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Hotel Revenue Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard shows various key metrics tracked in monitoring the hotel revenue generation. Metrics covered are revenue, average length of stay (ALOS), average Daily Rate (ADR), Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation, and Amortization (EBITDA)Revenue per Available Room (RevPAR), Occupancy Rate (OCC), Average Room Rate (ARR), Marketing ROI, Cost per Occupied Room (CPOR), Bookings by source, Gross Operating Profit (GOP), Revenue Per Available Seat Hour (revPASH), Market Penetration Index (MPI), Average Rate Index (ARI), Revenue Generation Index (RGI), Total Revenue Per Available Room (TRevPAR), Revenue per Occupied Room (RevPOR), Gross Operating Profit per Available Room (GOPPAR), Profit Per Available Room (PROFPAR) and Average Revenue Per Account (ARPA).
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Combo Chart, Map, Pie Chart, Column Chart, Spline Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Pharma Sales Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard tells the story of Rx and Non-Rx drugs Sales performance over different states via important key metrics. Compare the changes over different quarters, channels and analyze the sales and profit incurred.
Dashboard.Tags: Choropleth Map, Line chart, Card, Pie Chart, 100% Stacked Bar Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Pharma Production Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard gives an overview of important KPIs in drugs manufacturing processes like LAR, PQCR, LeadTime and the Manufacturing Cost of the drugs. Also take a view of overall production quality, drugs produced compared with its target set, over past quarters.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo box, Gauge, Area chart, Card,Stacked Column Chart, Grid, Pivot Grid

Dashboard.Name: Retail Store Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This retail store performance dashboard presents key metrics and KPIs: sales revenue, gross margin, conversion rate, foot traffic, inventory turnover, customer retention rate, and employee productivity. The dashboard provides a comprehensive view of the store's performance and helps identify opportunities for improvement.
Dashboard.Tags: DatePicker,Gauge, Bar_Chart,Scatter_Chart, Combo_Chart, Card, Column_Chart

Dashboard.Name: Retail Inventory Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Our retail inventory management dashboard provides key metrics and KPIs to help managers and owners effectively manage their inventory. By tracking inventory turnover, stock out rate, GMROI, sell-through rates, the order fill rate, and other important metrics, the dashboard helps to optimize inventory levels and increase profitability.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Gauge, Bar Chart, Spline Chart, Area Chart, Combo Chart, Tree Map,Grid

Dashboard.Name: Oil and Gas Production Monitoring Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: With this dashboard, you get the analysis of Oil and Gas production in BOEPD units across different wells. Values in this dashboard are represented as BOEPD (Barrels of Oil Equivalent Per Day). One barrel of Oil is equal to 159 liters of crude oil, and one barrel of Gas is equal to 5800 cubic feet of natural gas.
Dashboard.FileName: oil and gas production monitoring dashboard.sydj
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Line Chart, Stacked Column, Bar Chart, Choropleth Map

Dashboard.Name: Oil and Gas Wells Summary Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: With this dashboard, you get the complete summary of the wells managed by operator(s) from its current status, purpose the wells used, wells that are in down state and gross, net wells count over the past 6 months.
Dashboard.FileName: oil and gas wells summary dashboard.sydj
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Treemap, Grid, Column Chart, Pie Chart, Doughnut Chart

Dashboard.Name: HR Recruitment Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard is included with essential recruitment related KPIs of Human Resources (HR) department. HR admins can make use of these metrics and KPIs to improvise sourcing the best candidates for different roles. And constant monitoring helps them to cut costs and better understand factors that influence their hiring processes.
Dashboard.Tags: Grid, Bar Chart, Column Chart, Pie chart, Funnel Chart, Card

Dashboard.Name: Workforce Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard is included with essential workforce related KPIs of Human Resources (HR) department. The interactive metrics present in this dashboard helps both the HR department and top-level management to know about the quality level of their employees and other crucial metrics to improve the work-quality of their organization. Additional important KPIs include Absenteeism, Gender diversity ratio, Average employee tenure and so on.

Dashboard.Name: Ads Campaign Performance Dashboard

Dashboard.Name: Website Analytics Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard helps to monitor website revenue performance with the help of metrics like gross volume, bounce rate, customer churn rate, average revenue, monthly recurring revenue, lifetime value and more.

Dashboard.Name: Sprint Management in Agile
Dashboard.Description: This sprint management dashboard helps one who manages sprint (Scrum master) to track hours worked, planned and completed story points & tasks in a sprint. Also, track the tasks by its type and priority.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number Card, Column Chart, Spline Chart, Pie Chart, Treemap

Dashboard.Name: Release Management in Agile
Dashboard.Description: This Release Management Dashboard helps product managers to track the status of different product releases via metrics like release started date vs rollout date, days remaining for release, total hours worked, total completed tasks and completed story points. Also, track the tasks count and story points done by component and sprints.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number Card, KPI Card, Grid, Column Chart, Doughnut Chart, Line Chart, Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Customer Satisfaction Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Customer Satisfaction Dashboard helps the support team and product team to track the metrics such as Average response time, Net Promoter Score(NPS) with scale measures(promotors, passives, detractors), Customer Satisfaction Score (CSAT) and Customer Effort Score(CES).
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box,Number Card, KPI Card, Column Chart, Line Chart, Pie Chart, Doughnut Chart, Bar Chart, Stacked Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Defect Management in Agile
Dashboard.Description: This Defect Management Dashboard for Agile helps Product Managers to track the defect metrics such as Defect Density, Escaped Defect per Module, Defects Gap(%), Defects by Project, Type & Status, Defects Cycle Time, Defects by Reporter and Priority.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box,Number Card, KPI Card, Doughnut Chart, Spline Chart, Area Chart, Stacked Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Team Management in Agile
Dashboard.Description: This Team Management Dashboard helps project leads and managers track the team work status of each project with metrics such as total resources, overall task completion percentage, bug and feature tasks completion status, team roles, bug status, and task summary by resource, to direct the team most efficiently.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box,Number Card, KPI Card, Pie Chart, Column Chart, Doughnut Chart, Gauge, Grid, Bar Chart, 100% Stacked Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Construction Quality Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This construction quality management dashboard helps construction companies manage and monitor the quality of their projects including rework cost, safety meetings conducted, site inspections, types of defects, average time to fix the defects, NCR reports, net promoter score, customer satisfaction ratio (CSR), and more quality metrics.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Text, Number Card, Combined Widget, Pie Chart, KPI Card, Stacked Bar Chart, Gauge, Column Chart

Dashboard.Name: Construction Project Monitoring Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Construction Project Monitoring dashboard helps construction supervisors monitor their project statuses for various locations with important metrics: cost breakdown, schedule performance, cost performance, total budget, amount of budget spent, budget variance, project work status, project stages, estimation at completion, project duration, project details, completion percentage, actual and planned resources on each projects.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Label, KPI Card, Doughnut Chart, Grid, Pie Chart, Gauge, Number Card, Column Chart, Stacked Bar Chart

Dashboard.Name: Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Situation Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This coronavirus disease (COVID-19) situation dashboard helps healthcare providers track the health status of each country with metrics such as confirmed cases, recovered cases, deaths by date and country, and mortality rate by date.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number Card, Spline Chart, Grid, Image, Choropleth Map

Dashboard.Name: Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Daily Cases Analysis
Dashboard.Description: This COVID -19 Disease Daily Cases Analysis dashboard helps Hospital administrators, doctors, healthcare providers, physicians monitor health metrics such as new confirmed, recovered, and deaths over a date.
Dashboard.Tags: DatePicker, Combo Box, Spline Chart, Pie Chart

Dashboard.Name: Xero Online Accounting Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Xero online accounting dashboard helps business owners, bookkeepers, and accountants keep track of what is happening in their business with metrics such as bank balance, accounts receivable and payable, profit and loss details, an executive summary, and expense breakdowns.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Column Chart, Spline Chart, Pie Chart, Combined Widget, Bar Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Salesforce Marketing Leads Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Salesforce Marketing Leads Dashboard: This comprehensive dashboard displays critical metrics and KPIs in real time to help us monitor the performance of our marketing leads, our lead generation by source and country, and our conversion rates, total lead count, and conversion rates by month and country. To make data-driven decisions and optimize marketing campaigns, visualize data with interactive charts and cards.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Stacked Bar Chart,Doughnut Chart, Spline Chart, Choropleth Map, Stacked Area Chart

Dashboard.Name: Budget vs Actual Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Budget vs Actual Dashboard gives an overview of actual and budget income and expenses for a particular period of time.
Dashboard.Tags: Combine Widget, KPI card, Radial Gauge, Combo Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Twilio Voice Calls and SMS Tracking Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Twilio Voice Calls and SMS Tracking Dashboard provides insights into voice call and SMS message performance on the Twilio platform with the metrics: total calls, total cost of calls, total calls duration, total messages, total cost of messages, cost per call, calls by completion status, calls by date, messages by delivery status, duration of calls by date, and messages by date. The dashboard helps identify usage patterns, call quality issues, and cost management opportunities.
Dashboard.Tags: Card,Stacked Area, Spline Chart, Doughnut Chart, Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Asana Project Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Our Asana project management dashboard provides a comprehensive view of our project progress, team performance, and task metrics. The dashboard displays the total number of tasks, completion status, and planned vs completed tasks by project. The task completion rate metric helps us assess how well we're meeting our goals. Additionally, we can see the 5 most popular projects and estimate vs actual hours spent on each project. We can also track our progress over time with the planned vs completed tasks by date metric. Lastly, the task details section provides a detailed summary of individual tasks, including task name, assignee, due date, status, and dependencies.
Dashboard.Tags: DatePicker,Combo Box,Combined Widget, KPI Card, Radial Gauge, Doughnut Chart, Combo Chart, Pie Chart, Column Chart, Spline Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Mailchimp Email Campaign Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This email campaign performance dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of the performance of your email campaigns. It includes key metrics such as revenue per email, open rate, click-through rate, campaign click rate, and delivery rate. The dashboard also highlights important metrics such as abuse reports, bounce rate, unsubscribe rate, and unique unsubscriber clicks. Additionally, it provides insights into the revenue and orders generated by your campaigns, investment and revenue by campaign type, and the campaign conversion funnel. With the open rate and click rate broken down by date and campaign, you can easily track trends and optimize your campaigns accordingly. Overall, this dashboard offers a user-friendly interface with detailed metrics to help you track and improve the performance of your email campaigns.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Radial Gauge, Column Chart, Spline Chart, Funnel Chart, Bar Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Google Analytics Page Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Google Analytics Page Performance Dashboard displays essential metrics including page views, unique page views, entries, exits, and page load times for the last 7 days. It enables you to assess the popularity of various pages, user engagement, entry and exit points, and page loading efficiency. Learn how to leverage actionable information to enhance content, improve user experience, and boost website performance with this dashboard.
Dashboard.Tags: Number Card, Gauge,Stacked Bar Chart, Spline Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Google Analytics Website Traffic Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Google Analytics website traffic analysis dashboard provides key metrics to assess website performance and user engagement for the last 7 days. It offers insights into users, sessions, and average session duration. Additionally, it includes essential data such as the percentage of new users and bounce rate to evaluate user acquisition and engagement. The top 5 traffic sources by sessions highlight the sources of website traffic, while visitor distribution by country provides geographic insights. User acquisition by traffic sources helps understand the effectiveness of different traffic sources. User engagement is analyzed by comparing total users with new users, and visitor behaviour is explored through bounces and bounce rate metrics.
Dashboard.Tags: Card, Radial Gauge, Doughnut Chart, Spline Chart, Line Chart, Choropleth Map, Stacked Area Chart, Combo Chart

Dashboard.Name: Channel Performance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The YouTube Channel Performance Dashboard offers a comprehensive interface to monitor and analyze your channel's growth, engagement, and reach. Gain valuable insights, make data-driven decisions, and improve performance using the key metrics: engagement stats, gained versus lost subscribers, average view duration trend, view distribution by top traffic sources, watch time, traffic source analytics, total views, and views by device and operating system.
Dashboard.Tags: Number Card, Line Chart, Area Chart, Combine Widget, Area Chart, Doughnut Chart, Choropleth Map, 100% Stacked bar Chart, Heat Map, Grid

Dashboard.Name: K-12 Enrollment Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The K-12 Schools Enrollment Dashboard tracks enrollment trends, student-to-faculty ratios, the top 5 districts on enrollment, student acceleration, and the operating budget of each school. This gives a comprehensive view of the performance of each institution and student body. You can also forecast enrollment for the next three years.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Line Chart, Column Chart, Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: Clinical Trials Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The dashboard provides a review of all trials, summarizing the clinical trial data by intervention type, clinical phase, clinical condition, trial status, location, and more.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number card, Column Chart, Map, Doughnut Chart, Pie Chart, Line Chart,Stacked Bar Chart, Grid
Dashboard.Features: Master Filter, Conditional_Formatting-Grid, Trendline-Column_Chart, Top-N-Rank-Filter-Doughnut_Chart, Top-N-Rank-Filter-Pie_Chart, Forecasting-Line_Chart

Dashboard.Name: Balance Sheet Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This balance sheet dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of an organization's financial position and performance. It includes key metrics like cash balance, working capital, cash-to-cash cycle, AR turnover vs. AP turnover, and overall cash by year. The balance sheet section presents assets, liabilities, and equity, while metrics such as days sales outstanding, days inventory outstanding, days sales inventory, and days payable outstanding analyze sales and inventory cycles. The financial ratios overview offers insights into profitability, liquidity, and debt management. This dashboard empowers informed decision-making by offering a clear snapshot of an organization's financial health.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Card, Combined Widget, Text, Column Chart, Spline Chart, Radial Gauge, Pivot Grid

Dashboard.Name: Stack Overflow Developer Survey 2022 Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Stack Overflow Developer Survey is an annual survey of developers worldwide that provides information about their demographics, career goals, and technology usage. The Stack Overflow Developer Survey 2022 Dashboard visually represents this data and investigates long-term trends such as changes in programming language popularity and remote work. The dashboard is a valuable resource for developers and other stakeholders in the tech industry who want to stay up to date on the latest trends.
Dashboard.Tags: Bar Chart, Doughnut Chart, Stacked_Bar_Chart

Dashboard.Name: Business Survey Analysis Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Business survey dashboard helps to understand the customer opinions about a product/service. Also, it showcases the feedback on the product, identifies gaps, and thus helps the company to make changes to processes or the product/service accordingly.
Dashboard.Tags: Pie Chart,100% Stacked Bar Chart, Bar Chart, Heat Map, Doughnut Chart,Column Chart,100% Stacked Column Chart,Map Chart

Dashboard.Name: Pharmaceutical Labor Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard provides summarized details for a pharmacy's pharmaceutical labor management with metrics such as operation costs, labor costs, revenue and gross profit per prescription, work hours per job title, and prescription growth rate.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo box, Number Card, KPI Card, Grid, Line Chart, Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: Axosoft Release Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Axosoft Release Management dashboard provides a comprehensive view of project status, progress, and performance metrics. Key metrics include release progress by priority, workload by assignee, time spent on tasks by status, and cycle time. The dashboard enables easy tracking and monitoring of project statuses and helps teams to identify areas for improvement.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number Card, Radial Gauge, HeatMap, Stacked Bar Chart, Combo Chart, Area Chart, Line Chart, Pie Chart, Stacked Column Chart, Bar Chart, Column Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Sales Manager Summary Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This sales manager summary dashboard helps sales leads and managers track the company's revenue, including revenue trends, opportunity details, sales opportunity pipeline, revenue by country, accounts by revenue, win count, lost revenue, revenue won, win count trends, sales leaders by revenue won, revenue by industry, new accounts, and opportunity status by owner.

Dashboard.Name: Sales Leads Tracking Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This sales leads tracking dashboard helps sales leads and managers track their top 10 accounts by revenue, accounts by country, total accounts, total leads, accounts by industry, leads by source and owner, top 10 owners by accounts, leads by rating, leads by campaign, lead generation rate, and lead summary.

Dashboard.Name: Sales Opportunities Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This sales opportunities dashboard helps sales leads and managers track sales opportunities, including sales progress by country, total opportunities, deals won vs. lost by revenue, deals won vs. lost by owner, opportunity by rating, top 5 won opportunities, top 5 accounts by opportunities, campaign type, top 5 campaigns by opportunities, sales revenue by campaign, opportunity summary, opportunity status by owner, estimated vs. actual revenue, and top 10 customers by estimated revenue.

Dashboard.Name: Forum Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This forum management dashboard helps moderators effectively manage and maintain their forums by tracking key metrics and KPIs such as average posts per forum, average views per forum, overall questions and answers for posts, posts with the most votes, and more.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, KPI Card, Number Card,Pie Chart, Bar Chart, Column Chart, Spline Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Orthopaedic Clinical Variation Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: Orthopaedic Clinical Variation Dashboard is an Operational analysis Tool for hospital executives to track patient management metrics Diagnostic Related Group(DRG) details, Treatment charges, Average length of stay (ALOS), up-to-date ward details, Admissions, and Re-admissions which helps in reducing readmissions and managing the length of stay.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number card, Column Chart, Bar Chart, Area Chart, Stacked Column Chart, Line Chart, Pie Chart

Dashboard.Name: Sales Activities Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This Pipedrive sales activities dashboard tracks activities over a specific period of time. It helps monitor sales metrics: overall activities status, top deals won amount, products sold, completed activities by type, win rate, deals overview, and activities summary. You can also track the pipeline stages to be processed to win a deal.
Dashboard.Tags: Image, DatePicker, KPI card, Number card, Bar Chart, Combined Widget, Pie Chart, Funnel Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Outlook Calendar Events Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Outlook Calendar Events Dashboard gives you a complete picture of your event planning: events that were attended, scheduled, and cancelled, as well as metrics for meeting locations and event summaries. Maintain a clear grasp of your calendar using My Calendar Events Today and Upcoming Events This Week metrics. This dashboard, which focuses on attendance, engagement, and event success, offers optimization for increased efficiency and attendee pleasure. With the robust Outlook Calendar Events Dashboard, you can stay organized and ahead of the game.
Dashboard.Tags: DatePicker,Number card, Doughnut Chart,Pie Chart, Column Chart, Heat Map, Grid, Spline Chart,Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Outlook Calendar Events Organizer Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Outlook Calendar Events Organizer Dashboard improves event organization by tracking events by organizer, status, response type of top invitees, meeting sites, and success/cancellation rates. Keep up to date with the Scheduled Events Summary grid for a complete picture. Interactive visualizations such as bar charts, doughnut charts, stacked bars, and gauges facilitate effective coordination and informed decision-making. With this comprehensive dashboard, you can streamline your events and achieve successful execution.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo, Gauge, Doughnut Chart, Stacked Bar Chart, Bar Chart, Tree Map, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Fusebill Subscription Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Fusebill Subscription Management Dashboard provides a comprehensive view of a company's subscription-based business operations. It includes widgets to track key metrics such as total customers, subscriptions, and invoices, monthly recurring revenue, churn rate, and subscription cancellation rate. You can also monitor accounts receivable by due split, accounts receivable balance, net collection, deferred revenue, and earned revenue. Additionally, you can view customer information such as customers by status, customers by account status, and top 5 customers by revenue and monthly recurring revenue. You can also track revenue by company, payment method breakdown, payments by month, subscription by plan and status, and invoice summary details. With this dashboard, a company's leaders can quickly and easily monitor their business performance, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions to optimize their subscription-based business.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Card, Area Chart, Bar Chart, Tree Map, Doughnut Chart, Column Chart, Radial Guage, Stacked Column Chart, Pie Chart, Spline Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: Agent Activity Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The goal of the Freshdesk Agent Activity Dashboard is to provide insight into a company's customer experience, the level and type of support it offers, and customer loyalty using metrics like response time, resolution time, and agent workload.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number card, KPI card, Combo Box, Heat Map, Bar Chart, Doughnut Chart,Spline Chart

Dashboard.Name: HR Payroll Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard is included with essential payroll salary-related KPIs of the Human Resources (HR) department. HR admins can make use of these metrics and KPIs to track each employee(s) performance and salary details. And helps them to identify trends without running reports or sifting through paperwork.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number card, Stacked Bar Chart, Bar Chart, KPI card, Doughnut Chart, Stacked Column Chart, Label, Combined Widget, Grid, Line Chart

Dashboard.Name: Customer Ticket Traffic Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Customer ticket traffic Management dashboard shows a detailed view of your customer tickets including new tickets and escalated tickets, tickets handled by group, tickets by source, resolved vs. unresolved tickets by priority, customer satisfaction rate, unassigned tickets, average first response time, and average resolution time.
Dashboard.Tags: Date Picker, Number card,Radar Polar,Spline Area Chart, Pie Chart,Doughnut Chart, Column Chart, Combine Widget, Grid, Radial Gauge

Dashboard.Name: HR Employee Details Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This HR employee dashboard tracks employee details: productivity rate, overall labor effectiveness, employees by age, employee salary by month, employee details, employees by department, active employees, overall labor effectiveness by department, absentee rate, employees by gender, and absentee rate by department.

Dashboard.Name: HR Training Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This HR training dashboard tracks training details: total participants, total completed training, cost per participants, cost per hour for training, new participants, participants by training mode, satisfaction level, region-based participants, length of training by course, absentee rate, compensation classes, compensation cost, budget vs. training costs, participants by course and gender, participant count by month, top courses based on rating, lowest rated courses, and training details.

Dashboard.Name: HR Attendance Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This dashboard shows the attendance details of a company including employee name, employee days present and absent, leave taken, overall attendance percentage, overtime hours, absences by month, check-in time statistics, employees by experience and designation, employee check-in time status, resignation statistics, leave type distributors, late comers vs early check-ins, absentee details, perfect attendance, current day status, and employee attendance.

Dashboard.Features: Master Filter, Conditional_Formatting-Grid, Relative_Date_Filter-Area_Chart, Drill_Down-Column_Chart, Relative_Date_Filter-Date_Picker

Dashboard.Name: Intervals Project Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Intervals project management dashboard is a powerful tool that provides a comprehensive overview of your project's progress, tasks, milestones, and performance metrics. It helps your team stay organized, collaborate seamlessly, and achieve successful project completion. With Intervals, you can easily track your project's status and identify potential bottlenecks or issues, allowing you to take proactive measures and ensure timely delivery. Say goodbye to project chaos and hello to streamlined project management with Intervals.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number Card, Combined widget, Gauge, Bar Chart, Doughnut Chart, Column Chart, Stacked Column Chart, Column Chart, Bar Chart,Grid

Dashboard.Name: HR Trainer Details Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The HR Trainer Details Dashboard showcases human resources trainer metrics including trainer cost, average weekly hours, top 5 trainers by customer satisfaction, customer satisfaction score, trainer competency rate, trainer cost by course, course by training status, trainer by experience, average weekly hours per month, upcoming training sessions, overall trainer satisfaction by month, hours of training by month, completed training sessions, course completion rate, and trainer details.
Dashboard.Tags: Combo Box, Number Card, Radial Gauge, Doughnut Chart, Bar Chart, Column Chart, Area Chart, Spline Chart, Grid

Dashboard.Name: HR Training Feedbacks Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This HR training feedback dashboard lets HR admins view detailed statistics about feedback given and received for trainers, trainee performance, trainer satisfaction, and so on. Dashboard.Name: Toggl Project Time Tracking Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Toggl project time monitoring dashboard provides a detailed snapshot of your project's performance. Track time spent on tasks and projects, as well as task cycle time and completion rate. Analyze planned versus completed tasks by date, detect overdue and incomplete work by assignee, keep track of clocked hours by week, and remain up to date on project completion hour trends. With a handy summary, you can stay on top of open assignments.

Dashboard.Name: Podio Project Management Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: The Podio Project Management Dashboard provides a detailed picture of your project's performance. Track time spent on tasks and projects, as well as task cycle time and completion rate. Analyze and identify overdue and incomplete tasks by priority and assignee, and remain up to date on trends in project resource allocation. With this dashboard, you can easily stay on top of projects with a concise summary and make data-driven decisions.

Dashboard.Name: HR Employee Attendance Details Dashboard
Dashboard.Description: This HR Employee Attendance Details Dashboard helps HR admins to monitor each employee's attendance details and create reports easily. Dashboard.Name: SurveyMonkey Survey Overview Dashboard

The time frame in which a survey is completed is also captured to get a glimpse of the survey's level of engagement.
